author: Lon.TV
description:
Find one at Walmart - https://lon.tv/jcleu (compensated affiliate link) - HP has a super inexpensive laptop available at Walmart that is surprisingly useful and upgradeable for its $179 price tag. A great pairing for Linux. See more laptops: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZHp4d1HnItLi4_4nwCJ89-aXdkVtrL5 and subscribe! http://lon.tv/s
